<traits>

You've learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection. When you [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) to gain a circumstance bonus to AC from a [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1), increase the bonus from +1 to +2.
